name: Player22 free online games and chat rooms
name_original: Player22 free online games and chat rooms
description:
Play online multiplayer games, join our live chat rooms, make local and international friends, with this free game and social application.

[--- List of multplayer games included ---]

Play online with real human opponents:

+ Pool, with the rules of 8-ball Snooker.
+ Board games: Connect 4. American Checkers. Chess. Othello. Sea battle. Tic-tac-toe.
+ Brain games: Memory, Monkey fruits, Sudoku.
+ Bocce ball: The french game, in our original adaptation ...

[--- List of social features ---]

We offer so many ways to communicate and make friends, that you can meet people directly inside the app. So you can keep your contact details private, and meet new people while staying safe.

+ Private chat: By writing of course, and also share photos and voice messages.
+ Video calls: Anonymously call anyone using our free video-conferencing feature.
+ Internal private email box between users.
+ Public live chat rooms, Forum boards: By country and by local language.
+ Friend lists: Keep your own buddy list for instant messaging.
+ Dating; events organization ...

Note: The app has moderators and we require a correct behaviour from everyone.
